'''Polybeus''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] who lived during the [[Age of Discovery]].
document_data.History: This arcanist developed a single [[spell]] during their lifetime. This spell, ''[[continual light]]'', was developed in {{YearlinkConvert|2695|NY}}.
